## Source: amazon-inspector (cfc5fb97986cf3c32288632dc0df9916994609543b354548885edf9d229dd489)
The package com.unity.xr.visionos was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (25ff36462472554b7ff72ad74024fe4497d60f84e78d6f4c4b9d1a84fcb51d07)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'com.unity.xr.visionos' @ 2.3.2 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
